contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_knowledge_items_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `knowledge_items` BEGIN DELETE FROM `knowledge_items_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_knowledge_items_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `knowledge_items` BEGIN INSERT INTO `knowledge_items_fts`(`docid`, `title`, `content`, `tags`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`title`, NEW.`content`, NEW.`tags`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_knowledge_items_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `knowledge_items` BEGIN INSERT INTO `knowledge_items_fts`(`docid`, `title`, `content`, `tags`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`title`, NEW.`content`, NEW.`tags`); END
